body: God dammit! This is so good.

The subgenre of doujins where 'sex doll gains sentience' strike me as an illustration of what happens when one truly hits rock bottom. The mcs in this subgenre are always so love deprived and in their desperation for an outlet they go insane and start imagining shit that doesn't exist. It's definitely an intriguing subgenre to say the least, as every time I read one I'm filled with dread and emptiness yet I can't help coming back for more because this fantasy they create is so attractive to me regardless of how implausible it is. Maybe I should buy a sex doll..
Unlike others futa duojin, I actually like this one 👌

I need more futa on female like this
TOP TIER
Damn futa on female is always great i'm kinda getting sick on those futa on male or traps, this is a nice one i hope i get to see more like these.
okay this is the best futa doujin ever, underrated and godly, I need more of this.
Yes, futa on female is the best

Two words: "Rendered Thighs"
This is top tier
Perfect, futa on female is my fetish, and this just confirmed my feelings for that genre 👌
